name: Cheddas Space Vacation DEMO
description:
Cheddas Space Vacation is a game where you play as a penguin on his dream vacation. In this game you will climb trees to get some sweet tasty mangos and fly through space in his very own boat rocket car thingy. All of this with the help of his French companion, Boox Le Box. 

This game is a demo and may be expanded on and improved in the future.
